articles.author: Clayton Davis
articles.title: Wagner Moura on Making Oscars History With ‘The Secret Agent’ and His Warning to America: ‘Polarization Is Democracy’s Greatest Threat’ - Variety
articles.description: Wagner Moura on his historic Oscar nomination, Brazil’s past under dictatorship and why Donald Trump alarms those who’ve lived it.
articles.content:
Brazilian film star Wagner Moura, standing on the rooftop of the Variety offices in Los Angeles, says, with a trace of wonder, “I can see my house from here.”
But Moura, 49, has a lot more on his mi… [+11465 chars]
